A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars the Last Jedi is a great blockbuster film\, but it is not a great Star Wars film. Action scenes are fantastic\, but the plot and characters fail to develop in a way I had hoped. Some characters become utterly meaningless and others get way too much screen time. I enjoyed this movie as an action film\, but it hurts as a Star Wars fan to see where the franchise has gone. Also\, Luke Skywalker's legacy is tainted and it leaves a sour taste in fans mouths.
